/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the scene. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The predominant colors in the image are blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
